footer.message: Mvidpass is a comedy video website which provides the best selection of funny videos for our subscribers. We focus on everything humorous, funny and interesting around the web. Our videos are categorized into different collections. Let us make you burst into laughing - Check out here now!

video_landing.videoError: To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser thatsupports HTML5 video

landing.text1: Join mvidpass.com. You can find all funny videos here!
landing.footerText: Join or subscribe to mvidpass.com for £4.50 per week and enjoy full access to our funny videos collections on your mobile phone. By signing up the service, you acknowledge and confirm that you have read the terms & conditions. For help, please email our support at customerservice.uk@mvidpass.com or call 03300412846
